description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Award winning Biology Battle!  Come play XBLCG's highest rated Dual Stick Shooter, the original and competitive SURVIVAL MODE or the 11 PARTY GAMES!  Biology Battle is a modern, fast-paced take on the action arcade genre. Fight for topscore in our online challenge, or battle your friends through 12 unique 'party game' modes.  v1.93
